resources.string: Only gnolls can equip Gnoll Armor!
Wearers of Gnoll-Lieutenant suit well known for their ability to persuade even extremely angry mobs to be loyal servants of the Crown.
Traditional Tomahawk created by Gnoll artisans, each clan has its own unique design. This Tomahawk is slightly lighter than the counterparts made by humans.
To unlock this class you must persuade town priest to heal Gnoll Brute
Heal all your minions - %d gold only!

string-array.name: HeroClass_GnollPerks
string-array.item: Gnolls do not attack another Gnolls until provoked.
